title: WebStudio
description: Web-site for web-studio consists of two pages with navigation and burger menu. The web-site has been created with HTML, has adaptive design, order and subscription forms

title: Ice-cream
description: Wed-site for ice-cream company whith adaptive design, reviews slider, map and order form. The web-site has been created with Parcel, has basic animation and styled using preprocessor SCSS

title: Movies project
description: Website for searching popular films with the possibility loginization, watching trailers, adding to queue for watching or add as a watched film

title: Filmoteka project
description: Web-site for movies reflects trending movies via API and allows movies search by name and get main information about film and watch trailer if it available. MovieInfo page also contains movie gallery, cast and reviews of the film
